short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove citations from Wikipedia articles (all languages)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Citations are used to link parts of the article to sources, situated in the "References" section, at the bottom of the page. Citations contribute to legitimation of presented data, but they can be annoying when the use of copy/paste is required.
